title: Ironman Sells Off FulGaz to Rouvy In a Messy Split
content:
Rouvy purchases competing indoor cycling platform FulGaz and starts a partnership with Ironman. But it gets more complicated from there.

Read the full article at Ironman Sells Off FulGaz to Rouvy In a Messy Split on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
